title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LXIII, pt. 5505 - Prohibited Conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LXIII, pt. 5505 - Prohibited Conduct

State Regulations
§ 5505.1 - Compliance with orders of authority employees or police
§ 5505.2 - Disruptive conduct
§ 5505.3 - Parades, assemblages or demonstrations
§ 5505.4 - Hitchhiking; loitering
§ 5505.5 - Soliciting and commercial activity
§ 5505.6 - Damaging authority property
§ 5505.7 - Littering
§ 5505.8 - Possession and consumption of alcoholic beverages
§ 5505.9 - Transporting or storing dangerous materials

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LXIII, pt. 5505

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, § 578 [30]; Vehicle and Traffic Law, §1630

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
